description: Repository interface for Todo entities, providing method to find todos with filtering options.

classes.name: TodoRepository
classes.description: Spring Data JPA repository interface for Todo entities, including custom query for filtered search.

methods.name: findFiltered
methods.description: Finds Todo entities filtered by completion status and search query on title or description.

calls: select t from Todo t where (:completed is null or t.completed = :completed) and (:q is null or lower(t.title) like lower(concat('%', :q, '%')) or lower(t.description) like lower(concat('%', :q, '%'))) order by t.createdAt desc
